name: Sympathia
description:
『Dodge × Beat』

Sympathia is a rhythm game in which the player presses the notes while avoiding flying bullets.
The main characters are "Tomoha Sasanaki (Sana)" a girl with a miraculous ability, and "Turk" a high-performance robot.
Sana and Turk can synchronize with other people's hearts through their miraculous ability "Sympathia".
In order to wake up everyone whom the genius doctor "Hakuho Kurasagi" put to sleep, try to synchronize with the beating of their hearts while avoiding the defensive reactions of their hearts.

    * Beat to the rhythm!* Tap the beat on the move and create your own unique rhythm!* Enjoy the story that unfolds in the doctor's house!* Easy (Mild) and Difficult (Severe) modes are available.
